name: Secretary Of Death
description:
"fear"

In Secretary of Death the question is: Is there a meaning to everything? Can love last forever and never die? Can happiness be anything more than just temporary? Do our lives even matter at all? Well… of course not.

This title is an original ATP Projects release, published 2006-04-28. The writing, production and direction was done by mikey. The character art was done by Glumanda. The title uses the Ren'Py engine modified by PyTom. Estimated completion time is 30 minutes.

Secretary Of Death is game Nr. 9 of the Original 22.
